question: 毛糸
sourceMnemonic: When you have <kanji>fur</kanji> <kanji>string</kanji> (aka string made of fur) what do you think of? Hopefully <vocabulary>wool yarn</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for these kanji are the kun'yomi readings. With <ja>毛</ja> you should have learned this reading via the vocab word in the previous level. With <ja>糸</ja> it's actually the main reading for the kanji, so you should already know it.
